about_the_game: The Deluxe Pack grants players the Deluxe Edition content including four unique recruitable gangsters, the Golden Weapon Set, and a unique execution animation for your boss character - the Curb Stomp Execution.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains moderate violence and mature themes.

detailed_description: The Deluxe Pack grants players the Deluxe Edition content including four unique recruitable gangsters, the Golden Weapon Set, and a unique execution animation for your boss character - the Curb Stomp Execution.
legal_notice: ©2020 Paradox Interactive. Empire of Sin and Paradox Interactive are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Paradox Interactive AB in Europe, the U.S., and other countries. Developed by Romero Games.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 Home Premium 64 bit SP1
  • Processor: Intel® iCore™ i3-530 or AMD® Phenom™ II X3 720
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 555 or AMD® Radeon™ HD 6790
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium™ G4600 or AMD® A10 7700K
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 750 Ti or AMD® Radeon™ HD 5870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: The Deluxe Pack grants players the Deluxe Edition content including four unique recruitable gangsters, the Golden Weapon Set, and a unique execution animation for your boss character - the Curb Stomp Execution.
